explicitMods: 31% chance to gain a Flask Charge when you deal a Critical Strike

items.name: Golem Trail
enchantMods: 16% increased Attack and Cast Speed if you've Killed Recently
explicitMods: 10% chance to gain Onslaught for 4 seconds on Kill
10% increased Movement Speed if you haven't been Hit Recently
7% chance to gain Elusive on Critical Strike
10% increased Attack, Cast and Movement Speed while you have Onslaught
24% increased Effect of Tailwind on you
You have Tailwind if you have dealt a Critical Strike Recently

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that protects the lower half of your life, preventing some of the immediate life loss when damaged by hits and applying the loss over time instead. Your life cannot be raised above low life other than by flasks, and while above low life, skills will cost life as well as mana.
explicitMods:
Life Recovery other than Flasks cannot Recover Life to above Low Life
When taking Damage from Hits, 45% of Life loss below half Life is Prevented, then 141% of Life loss prevented this way is lost over 4 seconds
Skills gain a Base Life Cost equal to 40% of Base Mana Cost while not on Low Life
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants armour to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 2051 additional Armour
You and nearby allies gain 49% more Armour
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants additional energy shield and increased energy shield recharge rate to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 217 additional Energy Shield
You and nearby Allies have 5% increased Damage while on Full Energy Shield
You and nearby Allies gain 30% increased Energy Shield Recharge Rate
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will apply a cost & reservation multiplier to supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Storm Weaver

Trigger a Socketed Spell when you Use a Skill, with a 8 second Cooldown

socketedItems.secDescrText: Desecrates the ground, summoning corpses and dealing chaos damage to all enemies in the area. The corpses will be chosen from the monsters in the current area and any Spectres that have existed in this instance.

socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Consumes a corpse, granting all of your minions the power to block both attacks and spells. The skill consumes other nearby corpses, increasing the duration for each corpse consumed.
explicitMods: Additional 1.00 seconds Base Duration per extra corpse Consumed
Grants Minions +35% Chance to Block Attack Damage
Grants Minions +34% Chance to Block Spell Damage
Grants Minions 4% of Life Regenerated per Second if they have Blocked recently

socketedItems.secDescrText: Recalls all minions that are following you to your location, and grants them a temporary life regeneration effect.

You cannot have multiple banners at the same time.
